lyrics:
5 contributorsit’s true lyricsverse 1 brian
even a lover
makes a mistake sometimes
like any other
fall out and lose his mind
and i’m sorry for the things i did
for your teardrops over words i said
can you forgive me
and open your heart once again
oh yeah yeah

chorus all  brian
its true i mean it
from the bottom of my heart
yeah its true
without you i would fall apart
yeah yeah

verse 2 aj  nick
whatever happened
i know that i was wrong oh yes
can you believe me
maybe your faith is gone oh yes it is
but i love you and i always will
so i wonder if you want me still
can you forgive me
and open your heart once again
oh yeah yeah
you might also likechorus all aj  nick
its true yes its true
i mean it yeah yeah
from the bottom of my heart
yeah its true its true
without you i would fall apart
oooh ooh ooh

bridge brian
id do anything to make it up to you
so please understand please understand
and open your heart once again

chorus all nick brian  aj
its true i mean it oh oh oh
from the bottom of my heart from the bottom of my heart
yeah its true yeah yeah
without you i would fall apart apart
its true you know its true babe
i mean it you know i mean it
from the bottom of my heart from the bottom of my heart
yeah its true i mean it
without you i would fall apart

outro brian
oh oh yeah its trueembed
